section.title: Alerts
section.para: This tab controls certain aspects of what JGlideMon considers an alert as well as popup alerts.
JGlideMon will ignore things that it would usually consider an alert if your character is below "Minimum Character Level". You won't hear sounds or TTS on your mule character, for example.
If you do not wish for JGlideMon to automatically select the "Urgent Chat" tab when an urgent log entry is received, you can uncheck "Automatically switch to Urgent Chat tab".

By default, popup alerts (on Windows, a baloon popup by the clock) will be displayed when certain events occur. This can be disabled by unchecking the option. The popups are only displayed if JGlideMon is not the foreground window. Most options are self-explanatory. Options of special note include:
On Phat Loot - A popup will appear when you receive loot of a certain quality. This setting is controlled on the loot tab. On Other - "Other" refers to any Glider log entry that begins with a "!" or "*" that is not otherwise categorized.

note.para: The popup alerts can only be displayed if the tray icon is enabled and supported (that is, you have Java 1.6+). You do not necessarily have to enable minimizing to the tray.
